help-file.title: "CONJURE AIR"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: One elemental Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Summoning
"Conjure Air" summons an elemental from the air plane which will follow the player as though charmed for a limited period of time. If the elemental is aggressive when the charm wears off, it will attack you and others.
